text: The Canadian Soccer Association (; CSA) is the governing body of soccer in Canada. It is in charge of the men's and the women's soccer teams. The association was founded in 1912. It became a member of FIFA in 1912 and CONCACAF in 1961. title: Canadian Soccer Association
